roleset.name: hide from view; eclipse
roleset.note: OCCULT-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mappings. Framed by Katie. (from occult.01-v)

example.name: eclipse example
example.text: The moon will completely occult the sun for 6 minutes, 39 seconds.

example.name: hide example
example.text: The lids were occulting her eyes.
